title: New Creator: Painuser
body:
[Name]
Taylor 'Painuser' Parsons

[Channels]
https://www.twitch.tv/painuser
https://twitter.com/PainUser

[Info]
Painuser is the original Twitch streamer. After beginning on Justin.TV, Painuser worked with the founding team as one of Twitch's leading talent during the rise of StarCraft II. Now, Painuser wrecks noobs at VALORANT, and has an intimate community of diehards.

[Usecases]
Launch - Subscriber rewards, and prizing for viewer game tournaments.
Hold - Private Discord channel, and holder game days.
Transaction - Viewers of Painuser can make VALORANT hero and loadout requests, wager in 1v1, and buy FFA tournament seats.

[Treasury Tier]
$500

A 'yes' will approve painuser, and a $500 gift coin Treasury grant.
A 'no' will deny this prop.
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
